page.title: 17PUPIL'S DAY (continued).
page.content: We did various exercises like sitting on the bottom and floating on our front and back.Then I managed to swim half the pool.I changed quickly because it was cold.Then it was dinner time.We had a nice meal with rhubarb crumble for pudding.After our meal we played in the playground.I played Hot Chocolate with some other girls.In the afternoon we worked on our Spellaway and Direction books and then had a game of cricket on the recreation ground.Mr.Yeomans read the class story book until home time. I cycled home and played with my brother Leigh until it was time for tea.We then watched some television until it was time for bed.
